reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The app declares the collection of data as mentioned in the 'Information We Collect' section of the privacy policy.
reply.reference: When you use the Site, we process certain types of Information, as described below. URL: https://www.thehappyhournash.com/privacy-policy

You may be given the option to receive push notifications while using our Services. In order to serve push notific...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Information such as first and last names, phone numbers, residential addresses, email addresses, and payment information. Additionally, it collects Non-Personal Information related to user activity on the site, such as Internet connections, computer equipment, browser information, IP addresses, and other usage details.

content: Personal Information (names, phone numbers, addresses, email addresses, payment information)
Non-Personal Information (Internet connections, computer equipment, browser information, IP addresses, usage details)

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the specific types of data mentioned in the privacy policy related to Personal Information and Non-Personal Information collected by the app.
reply.reference: Personal Information that we collect on the Site includes, but is not limited to, first and last names, phone number, residential address, email address, and payment information. Non-Personal Information means information that does not identify you, but provides insights regarding your use of the Site, including but not limited to Internet connections, computer equipment, browser information, websites visited before entering and after leaving the Site, IP addresses, and other information about your use. URL: https://www.thehappyhournash.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection by unsubscribing from email communications through the 'unsubscribe' link or by contacting the app at info@thehappyhournash.com.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt-out of receiving email communications by using the 'unsubscribe' link or contacting the app directly.
reply.reference: If you no longer want to receive these e-mail communications, you may opt-out of receiving e-mail communications through the 'unsubscribe' link or by contacting us at info@thehappyhournash.com. URL: https://www.thehappyhournash.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with service providers, authorized third parties, third parties in the event of reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer, or other disposition, and as deemed necessary under applicable law or with express consent. The app may also use third-party e-mail providers.

content: Necessary third parties under applicable law

reply.analysis: The app shares data with various types of third parties as outlined in its privacy policy to provide services, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations.
reply.reference: Service providers that help us administer and provide the Services (for example, a web hosting company whose services we use to host our platform). These third-party services providers have access to your Personal Information only for the purpose of performing services on our behalf. URL: https://www.thehappyhournash.com/privacy-policy, Authorized third parties, who are parties directly authorized by you to receive the applicable Information, such as when you authorize a third-party application provider to access your account. The use of your Information by an authorized third party is subject to the third party’s privacy policy, Third parties in the event of any reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer, or other disposition of all or any portion of our business, assets or stock (including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings), in which case we will require the recipient to use such information in accordance with this Privacy Policy, As we believe necessary: (i) under applicable law; (ii) to enforce applicable terms and conditions; (iii) to protect our rights, privacy, safety or property, and/or that of our affiliates, you, or others; (iv) to detect, prevent, or otherwise address fraud, security or technical issues; (v) to respond to claims that contact information (e.g. name, e-mail address, etc.) of a third-party has been posted or transmitted without their consent or as a form of harassment and (vi) to respond to requests from courts, law enforcement agencies, regulatory agencies, and other public and government authorities, which may include authorities outside your country of residence; and, Pursuant to your express consent, In addition, we may use third‐party e‐mail providers to deliver communications to you. This is an opt-in e-mail program. If you no longer want to receive these e-mail communications, you may opt-out of receiving e-mail communications through the 'unsubscribe' link or by contacting us at info@thehappyhournash.com. URL: https://www.thehappyhournash.com/privacy-policy
